thread.title: Vicky Pattison predicts she'll marry boyfriend John Noble but jokes no kids because they'll 'destroy my vagina'
thread.title_full: Vicky Pattison predicts she'll marry boyfriend John Noble but jokes no kids because they'll 'destroy my vagina'

author: Lara Martin
title: Vicky Pattison predicts she'll marry boyfriend John Noble but jokes no kids because they'll 'destroy my vagina'
text:
Vicky Pattison predicts she'll marry boyfriend John Noble but jokes no kids because they'll 'destroy my vagina' The I'm A Celebrity winner is head over heels in love with businessman boyfriend Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Vicky Pattison has boldly predicted she’ll marry boyfriend John Noble, after declaring he’s The One for life - but kids may not be on the agenda. 
The former Geordie Shore star began dating businessman John last year, and he accompanied her to Australia when she was filming I’m a Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here! spinoff show Extra Camp. 
She frequently posts gushing tributes and pictures to social media, and he was by her side on Valentine’s Day when she was battling a severe bout of flu and ended up in hospital . 
So perhaps it’s no surprise she says he’s a keeper. Vicky's been dating John since last year (Photo: Instagram) Snapchatting from bed! (Photo: Snapchat) Read More Vicky Pattison denies she 'took up a valuable hospital bed' after falling ill with flu over Valentine's Day 
“John’s the one. I have no doubt in my mind. He’s the one I will settle down with and marry,” she told Daily Star on Sunday . 
But when asked about kids, she joked: “I love him and his company but I’m not prepared to carry something for nine months which would then ruin my body, steal my career and destroy my vagina. After all that what if it turns out to be a pr**k and I don’t even like it. Everyone says you will fall in love with your baby, but why?” 
Vicky recently paid gushing tribute to John after he spent Valentine’s Day in hospital with her, where she was undergoing tests. 
She said: “Happy Valentines to you all but most of all to my favourite human @johnnoblejn!!! I can't believe we're spending valentines in the hospital.. I'm so sorry but as long as I'm with you I am the happiest girl in the world! 
“Love you to the moon and back.” John shared this photo to Instagram (Photo: Johnnoblejn/Instagram) They spent Valentine's Day in hospital (Photo: Johnnoblejn/Instagram) Read More Vicky Pattison flaunts abs in crop top after furiously hitting back at claims she alters social media photos 
John, meanwhile, shared two images to his own Instagram showing Vicky lying in a hospital bed. He said: “Not the valentines we had planned but at least she got me ! I mean at least she's ok.” 
A rep for Vicky told Mirror Celebs that she has been suffering from a nasty flu and was in hospital for a blood test and antibiotics. 
“Vicky has been working really hard on her fitness for a month now but the flu has hit her pretty hard this week. She's in great shape but had to go to hospital today for a blood test and antibiotics to ensure she's fighting fit again,” said her spokesperson. Vicky predicts marriage to John (Photo: Getty) 
After leaving hospital, Vicky returned to Instagram to share an image of a beautiful bunch of red roses, presumably a gift from John, and a Valentine’s Day card. 
She wrote: “He's looked after me all through the night and all day, never left my side... He's more than my boyfriend, he's my best friend and the only man who's ever made me feel safe and loved... @johnnoblejn! Sorry I ruined Valentine's Day baby... I love you.” Like us on Facebook
